text: Khushhal Khan is a Pakistani actor and model who works in Urdu television. Khan is known for portraying Saim Ibrahim in Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri, Faraz in Mushkil and Shahmir Adam in Duniyapur. He is the recipient of a Hum Award. ==Filmography== === Films === Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2023 Gulabo Rani Saleem Short film; special appearance 2024 Poppay Ki Wedding Poppa Film debut ===Television series=== Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2021 Qissa Meherbano Ka Ayaz Supporting role Bebasi Sahir 2022 Mushkil Faraz Leading role Wehshi Asif 2023 Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri Saim Ibrahim 2024 Duniyapur Shahmir Nauroz Adam Yahya Yahya Mashkoor Hussain 2025 Ishq Di Chashni Sheikh "Sherry" Shehryar === Telefilm === Year Title Role Notes 2021 Aik Hai Nigar Shahid Supporting role ===Web series=== Year Title Role Notes Ref. 2021 Midsummer Chaos Sameer Acting debut 2024 Crossroads Burak Mini-series Barzakh Jafar Khanzada (young) Special appearance 2025 Zain Shehryar Filming == Awards and nominations == Year Award Category Work Result Ref. 2020 Hum Style Awards Best Emerging Talent â€“ Model 2024 Hum Awards Best Actor Popular Muhabbat Gumshuda Meri Best Onscreen Couple Popular (with Dananeer Mobeen) == References == Category:Living people Category:2000 births
